episodes.title: La Luz del Mundo
episodes.description:
I created a video, I want to be able to inform followers of cults that it is not often what it seems; it is easy to get manipulated, isolated by people easily. Cults can be dangerous and lead to individual threats. My audience is young people who are starting to involve themselves with "cult" looking groups. I want them to be able to see that even a church with a powerful view can have a dark and harmful background.

Work Cited: 

 “Death Threats, Broken Families, and Harassment in the Name of the Apostle.” EL PAÍS English, 13 June 2022, english.elpais.com/society/2022-06-13/death-threats-broken-families-and-harassment-in-the-name-of-the-apostle.html.


Leader of Religious Organization La Luz Del Mundo, Arrested at LAX on Multiple Human Trafficking and Child Pornography Charges. 24 Jan. 2025, www.ice.gov/news/releases/leader-religious-organization-la-luz-del-mundo-arrested-lax-multiple-human.


"The Darkness Within La Luz del Mundo." Netflix, directed by Carlos Perez Osorio, 2023.
